EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Information (1316443029.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Information (1316443029.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Milena,
I’m glad to hear you want to move forward with MBO! The next steps will be for you to send the contract to me to look over and I will then negotiate the contract on your behalf and send any requested changes to the client. Have you told them about MBO Partners and how we will be working with them? If not you might want to give them a heads up that I will be reaching out to them in the near future. I will also send you a link to enroll in our system and you will follow the link, fill out the online enrollment paperwork and at the end once you have signed the GSA, there will be an enrollment packet that you will print off that has an I-9 form in it. You will take that to a local notary and have them sign as an authorized representative in section 2 of the document and fax or email that back to me(or if you happen to be in the Herndon, VA area you can bring it in to our office and I will sign it).
Once you have enrolled and the contract is signed, I will be able to activate your MBO account and will give you instructions for time and expense entry so you can begin billing the client.
Please reach out to me if you have any additional questions and the sooner we get the contract negotiation process going the better chance we have of completing it by next week!
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Milena Yang [mailto:milenayang@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, September 19, 2011 10:29 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information
Hi Nicolette,
Sorry I was out of touch last week. I was wrapping up my last week of work and working on a possible contracting opportunity. I received the paperwork (an NDA and contract) this morning, so I think I'd like to go ahead and move forward with MBO's services ASAP. I'd ideally like to start on the new project a week from today.
Can you let me know what the next steps are?
Milena On Wed, Sep 7, 2011 at 1:16 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Milena,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today, and thank you again for your interest in MBO Partners. Below is the link for the case study that MBO sponsored for your review: http://www.marketwire.com/press-release/Landmark-National-Study-Reveals-Millions-Join-New-Age-Career-Independence-Surprising-1557357.htm
I have also attached some useful information about MBO as discussed. For more details regarding our benefits, please visit http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits I have also attached a link to my calendar below if you would like to schedule a time to speak to me with any additional questions you may have. https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK. Do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to help! Thank you and have a great day! Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
